verses.text: \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, my heart is not haughty, nor mine eyes lofty: neither do I exercise myself in great matters, or in things too high for me.
Surely I have behaved and quieted myself, as a child that is weaned of his mother: my soul iseven as a weaned child.
Let Israel hope in the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*from henceforth and for ever.
